prompt: Summarize the following in 3 bullet points: The quarterly sales report shows a 15% increase in revenue compared to last quarter. Customer satisfaction scores improved by 8 points. The new product launch exceeded expectations with 50,000 units sold in the first week.
Summarize this meeting note: John proposed moving the deadline to Friday. Sarah disagreed, suggesting Monday would be more realistic. The team voted and Monday was chosen.
Give a one-sentence summary: The weather forecast predicts rain on Tuesday and Wednesday, with temperatures dropping to 45 degrees.
